purpose: The Department of Computer Science at NOVA University Lisbon is inviting applications for six full-time, tenure-track Assistant Professor positions. They are looking for candidates in various research areas, including Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Software Engineering. The selection process will focus on research ability and how candidates' expertise complements the department's strengths. The first stage of the application process requires interested candidates to submit a CV, cover letter, and sample publications by May 29, 2025.
evidence_sentences: The Department of Computer Science at NOVA University Lisbon invites applications for six full-time, tenure-track Assistant Professor faculty positions in Computer Science.
We are primarily interested in recruiting excellent candidates in the areas of the department’s research groups on Computer Systems, Intelligent Systems, Multimodal Systems, and Software Systems.
The selection process focuses on a candidate's proven research ability and dedication, and how their expertise complements the Department’s established strengths.
During the first stage, we invite interested candidates to submit, by email to [log in to unmask]: a current CV, a cover letter including a short research statement, three sample publications.
For full consideration, first-stage applications must be received by May 29, 2025.
